reviews.text: I was traveling with my two young daughters and stayed here twice within a four day period as a stopping point between upstate NY and Virginia.
reviews.title: Pleasant stays

reviews.text: Stayed here for a few nights in November 2006. Located in good area, right outside of Valley Mall and other shopping. Nice clean atmosphere, very friendly people at front desk. Enjoyed grabbing the cookies at the front desk when going out for the day. Breakfast was good - juice, cereal, bagel, yogurt, etc...nothing heavy. My husband didn't like the breakfast selection though. Would definetly go back and recommend to others.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: I'm a bit particular when it comes to customer service, especially at a hotel, and these people surpassed my expectations in every way. Every single staff member that I encountered stepped right up to the plate and hit a home run. ( and the staff is plentiful). Check in was pleasant even though a lot of people were checking in when I was; the house keeping staff was speedy and thorough; and the rooms, well, the hotel website photos just don't do them justice. The rooms are large and well equiped with a marble topped area with coffee pot, microwave and refrigerator. The beds are awesome, firm but pillow-topped ~ which is excellent for someone who struggles with back pain like I do. You won't want to get out of bed! The lighting in the rooms is diverse, allowing either bright light for working, or soft light for R&R, and the window opens partially for fresh air in the room. The continental breakfast foods are typical of a quality continental breakfast, with yogart, pastries, oats, make-your-own waffles, several juice varieties, hot cocoa, cereal, fruit cups and whole fruit, and a variety of breads, but the service kicks it up a notch. As you walk into the area, the staff wishes you a good morning and then acclimates you with the spread to ease the normal confusion of a continental breakfast , and there is even an open air patio where you can enjoy your breakfast. And the pool, hot tub and finess room do not dissapoint either. You're 10 minutes from the outlets, and you're surrounded with both fast food and finer dining including Red Lobster, a fine looking steak house, Pizza Hut, McDonalds, Taco Bell, Wendy's, a Mexican restaraunt, ect. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel. It's brand new ~ 18 months old in Sept. 06. Enjoy!
reviews.title: LOVED IT, LOVED IT, LOVED IT!!!

likes.liked: — Great service, and beauty of accomodations

reviews.text: Unexpected stay for 1 week at Country Inn & Suites and was pleasantly surprised by the hotel. Hotel was very clean and the decor was charming. Reserved the king suite which was spacious and the bed was the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in. Continental breakfast was available every morning with a variety of items (the fresh made waffles were my favorite). If I'm ever in Hagerstown MD again, I'll definitely be staying at Country Inn & Suites.
reviews.title: Pleasant, Friendly & Clean

reviews.text: My family stayed at this hotel with a group attending an ice hockey tournament. Everyone in the group was very happy with the accomodations. Very clean and nicely decorated. Rooms are very spacious with extremely comfortable beds and all are equipped with refrigerators and microwaves. The breakfast is the best continental I've encountered. The kids loved the make your own belgian waffles. Staff was extremely helpful and courteous and even allowed us to use the breakfast area to have a team pizza party in the evening. It is located in an area with a lot of restaurants, stores, and a mall within walking distance. I highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Very Pleased

reviews.text: Clean rooms, GREAT beds and nice breakfast buffet. Our family of four stayed here on the way to Hershey, PA. The indoor pool is a bit small, but everything was top-rate. The staff was friendly and the beds are wonderful -- great pillowtop mattresses. The rooms are spacious with a microwave and fridge; there are even make-up remover wipes with the standard shampoo/conditioner toiletries.
reviews.title: Great Stay
